#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;


int last(int a,long int b){
if(a==0){return 0;}
if(b==0){return 1;}
if(a%10==0){return 0;}
if(a%10==1){return 1;}
if(a%10==5){return 5;}
if(a%10==6){return 6;}

}


int main()
{

int a[10][10];
int period[10];
for(int i=0;i<10;i++)
{
a[i][0]=i;
int sum=i;
int indicator=1;
//cout<<i<<"\t";
while(true){

sum=sum*i;
int v1=sum%10;
if(v1==a[i][0]){break;}
//cout<<v1<<"\t";
a[i][indicator]=v1;
indicator++;

}
//cout<<"\n";
period[i]=indicator;
//cout<<indicator<<endl;


}




int test;
cin>>test;
while(test--){
long int x,y;
cin>>x>>y;
if(x==0){cout<<"0"<<endl;}
if(y==0){cout<<"1"<<endl;}
x=x%10;
y=y%period[x];
if(y!=0){y--;}
else{

y=period[x];
y--;
}

cout<<a[x][y]<<endl;

}






}
